snippet: Given the culture of the National Football League, which grooves on manliness, Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo is an odds-on bet to trot out onto the field this Sunday against the Jacksonville Jaguars, who are 1-8.
abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times contends that given aggressively male culture of the National Football League, Dallas Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo will surely trot out onto the field against the Jacksonville Jaguars despite acute pain he is experiencing from back injury.
lead_paragraph: Given the culture of the National Football League, which grooves on manliness, Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo is an odds-on bet to trot out onto the field this Sunday against the Jacksonville Jaguars, who are 1-8.

headline.seo: Given the N.F.L.'s Culture of Manliness, an Injured Tony Romo Likely Will Play in London
headline.main: A League Grins as a Star Grimaces
headline.print_headline: A League Grins as a Star Grimaces
